templates_data.report_description: Monitor PCI DSS controls and produce evidence for audits.

data.name: PCI DSS Compliance Report
data.description: Monitor PCI DSS controls and produce evidence for audits.

data.text: PCI Section 1: Network Security / PCI Section 4: Encrypt Transmission

data.phrase:
preset = network_story 
| filter associated_rules != null and associated_rules != ""
| comp count() by associated_rules
|
 view graph type = column subtype = grouped header = "Top triggered network rules in the past 24 hours" xaxis = associated_rules yaxis = count_1 legend = `false` xaxistitle = "Triggered Rule Name" yaxistitle = "# of events"

command.name: header
command.value: "Top triggered network rules in the past 24 hours"

data.text: PCI Section 2: Config Management / PCI Section 12: Policy Management

data.phrase:
dataset = endpoints 
| fields endpoint_name, assigned_prevention_policy, assigned_extensions_policy
| filter assigned_prevention_policy in($policy)
| dedup endpoint_name 
| comp count(endpoint_name) as PreventionPolicyCount by assigned_prevention_policy
|
 view graph type = bubble subtype = packed header = "Prevention policy grouped by endpoint count" xaxis = assigned_prevention_policy yaxis = PreventionPolicyCount

data.text: PCI Section 3: Protect Data / PCI Section 5: Defend Systems

data.phrase:
dataset = incidents 
| comp count() as the_count by severity 
| sort desc the_count
| view graph type = column subtype = grouped header = "Incident count by severity" xaxis = severity yaxis = the_count legend = `false` xaxistitle = "Severity" yaxistitle = "# of incidents"

dataset = endpoints
| filter domain in($domain) 
| fields endpoint_name, agent_version, content_version, assigned_prevention_policy

preset = xdr_login_events 
| filter array_length(assigned_privileges ) > 0 or elevated_token != null
| filter agent_hostname in($host)
| comp count() as login_count by agent_hostname, agent_ip_addresses, agent_os_type  
| sort desc login_count
| fields agent_hostname, agent_ip_addresses, agent_os_type, login_count
| limit 100

preset = authentication_story
| alter target_or_domain = coalesce(auth_target , auth_domain)
| comp count_distinct(auth_client) as unique_clients by associated_products, target_or_domain
| sort desc unique_clients
| limit 100
| alter target_or_domain_with_product = concat(target_or_domain, " (", associated_products, ")")
|
 view graph type = pie xaxis = target_or_domain_with_product yaxis = unique_clients

preset = device_control 
| filter event_sub_type = ENUM.DEVICE_PLUG 
| filter agent_hostname in($host)
| comp count() as HOST by agent_hostname
|
 view graph type = wordcloud header = "Hosts with USB Plug-in events" xaxis = agent_hostname yaxis = HOST

preset = xdr_login_events 
| filter agent_hostname in($host)
| filter (action_local_port in (22, 23, 445, 3389))

dataset = endpoints 
| filter last_upgrade_status = "FAILED"
| filter assigned_prevention_policy in ($policy)
| comp count () as completed
|
 view graph type = gauge subtype = radial header = "Endpoints with failed upgrade status" yaxis = completed maxscalerange = 10 scale_threshold("#38c400","#f59504","5","#e60700","7")

widgets_data.title: Compliance: Access Control
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to monitor access to systems. Use this widget to query XDR login events.

data.phrase:
preset = xdr_login_events 
| filter array_length(assigned_privileges ) > 0 or elevated_token != null
| filter agent_hostname in($host)
| comp count() as login_count by agent_hostname, agent_ip_addresses, agent_os_type  
| sort desc login_count
| fields agent_hostname, agent_ip_addresses, agent_os_type, login_count
| limit 100

widgets_data.title: Compliance: Identify
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to monitor the identity of users, devices, and processes. Use this widget to query uniquely targeted clients.

data.phrase:
preset = authentication_story
| alter target_or_domain = coalesce(auth_target , auth_domain)
| comp count_distinct(auth_client) as unique_clients by associated_products, target_or_domain
| sort desc unique_clients
| limit 100
| alter target_or_domain_with_product = concat(target_or_domain, " (", associated_products, ")")
|
 view graph type = pie xaxis = target_or_domain_with_product yaxis = unique_clients

widgets_data.title: Compliance: Policy/Configuration Management
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to monitor and maintain secure configurations. Use this widget to query prevention policy information.

data.phrase:
dataset = endpoints 
| fields endpoint_name, assigned_prevention_policy, assigned_extensions_policy
| filter assigned_prevention_policy in($policy)
| dedup endpoint_name 
| comp count(endpoint_name) as PreventionPolicyCount by assigned_prevention_policy
|
 view graph type = bubble subtype = packed header = "Prevention policy grouped by endpoint count" xaxis = assigned_prevention_policy yaxis = PreventionPolicyCount

widgets_data.title: Compliance: System Management
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to ensure the integrity of systems and data. Use this widget to query the endpoints with a failed upgrade status.

data.phrase:
dataset = endpoints 
| filter last_upgrade_status = "FAILED"
| filter assigned_prevention_policy in ($policy)
| comp count () as completed
|
 view graph type = gauge subtype = radial header = "Endpoints with failed upgrade status" yaxis = completed maxscalerange = 10 scale_threshold("#38c400","#f59504","5","#e60700","7")

widgets_data.title: Compliance: Maintenance
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to establish processes and controls for ongoing maintenance. Use this widget to endpoint and product information.

data.phrase:
dataset = endpoints
| filter domain in($domain) 
| fields endpoint_name, agent_version, content_version, assigned_prevention_policy

widgets_data.title: Compliance: Threat Protection/Incident Response
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to detect, respond to, and recover from security incidents. Use this widget to query incidents by severity.

data.phrase:
dataset = incidents 
| comp count() as the_count by severity 
| sort desc the_count
| view graph type = column subtype = grouped header = "Incident count by severity" xaxis = severity yaxis = the_count legend = `false` xaxistitle = "Severity" yaxistitle = "# of incidents"

widgets_data.title: Compliance: Continuous Monitoring
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to assess, authorize, and monitor systems. Use this widget to query XDR login events.

data.phrase:
preset = xdr_login_events 
| filter agent_hostname in($host)
| filter (action_local_port in (22, 23, 445, 3389))

widgets_data.title: Compliance: Physical Protections
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to protect physical assets and facilities. Use this widget to query USB plug-in events.

data.phrase:
preset = device_control 
| filter event_sub_type = ENUM.DEVICE_PLUG 
| filter agent_hostname in($host)
| comp count() as HOST by agent_hostname
|
 view graph type = wordcloud header = "Hosts with USB Plug-in events" xaxis = agent_hostname yaxis = HOST

widgets_data.title: Compliance: Transmission/Network Security
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to protect and monitor communications channels. Use this widget to query triggered network rules.

data.phrase:
preset = network_story 
| filter associated_rules != null and associated_rules != ""
| comp count() by associated_rules
|
 view graph type = column subtype = grouped header = "Top triggered network rules in the past 24 hours" xaxis = associated_rules yaxis = count_1 legend = `false` xaxistitle = "Triggered Rule Name" yaxistitle = "# of events"

command.name: header
command.value: "Top triggered network rules in the past 24 hours"
